Hi Eb,

> I concur however, its sorta assumed that my client will understan=
d the media
> becuase I had to take the media type into consideration from =
the get go.  

I agree. You have to bake knowledge of media type(s) and lin=
k relations into clients.

> I
> probably won't think (or care about) inter=
mediaries depending on the "reach"
> of my solution, intranet versus intern=
et for example.  So when we suggest
> using "standard" media types for purp=
oses of reach, we just need to be clear
> as to what concerns we're focusin=
g on.

1. Re-use of standard libraries for building consumers/services
2. S=
erendipitous re-use of services  

Jim
